trans-unit.source: Specifies which parts are included in a message.
trans-unit.target: 指定要包含在訊息中的部分。

trans-unit.source: This specification is used to indicate which message parts need to be signed and which parts need to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 這個規格會用來指出必須簽署的訊息部分以及必須加密的部分。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化空的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether the message body is included in the specification.
trans-unit.target: 初始化以指定是否在規格中包含訊息本文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> and specifies whether the message body is included.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />，並指定是否要包含訊息本文。

trans-unit.source: The array of header types to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用之標頭類型的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> with an array of message headers.
trans-unit.target: 使用訊息標頭陣列，初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />。

trans-unit.source: Each header is specified using its name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 每個標頭都是使用其名稱和命名空間所指定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes whether the message body is included in the specification.
trans-unit.target: 初始化以指定是否在規格中包含訊息本文。

trans-unit.source: The array of header types to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用之標頭類型的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> with an array of message headers.
trans-unit.target: 使用訊息標頭陣列，初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" />。

trans-unit.source: Each header is specified using its name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 每個標頭都是使用其名稱和命名空間所指定。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the `isBodyIncluded` parameter specifies whether the message body is to be included or not.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`isBodyIncluded` 參數還會指定是否要將訊息本文包含在內。

trans-unit.source: Clears the list of headers in this specification.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個規格中的標頭清單。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> is read only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the header types for this specification.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個規格的標頭類型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" /> that holds the header types for this message specification.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1" />，其中保存這個訊息規格的標頭類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message body is included in this specification.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出訊息本文是否包含在這個規格中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message body is included in this specification; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果訊息本文包含在這個規格中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> is read only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specification is read only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出規格是否是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specification is read only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果規格是唯讀的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.MakeReadOnly%2A> to set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.MakeReadOnly%2A>，將這個屬性設定為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.Clear%2A> sets the property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.Clear%2A> 會將屬性設定為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specification to read only.
trans-unit.target: 將規格設定成唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.Clear%2A> removes all headers in the specification and makes the collection read/write.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.Clear%2A> 會移除規格中的所有標頭，並將集合設定成讀取/寫入。

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個類別的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An empty instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `null`, a new empty instance of this class is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是 `null`，就會為這個類別建立空的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Merges two message part specifications.
trans-unit.target: 合併兩個訊息部分規格。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.Union%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification> holds all header information from both specifications, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.IsBodyIncluded%2A> property is set to the logical OR of both specifications.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.Union%2A> 方法之後，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification> 會保存兩個規格中的所有標頭資訊，而 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification.IsBodyIncluded%2A> 屬性會設定為兩個規格的邏輯 OR 運算。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> is read only.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessagePartSpecification" /> 是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="other" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。
